Ross Applied AI Consulting (Ross Applied AI)
https://rossapplied.ai

Summary
Ross Applied AI Consulting is a Tulsa-based AI consulting firm focused on practical, measurable business outcomes. We help businesses assess AI opportunities, integrate proven tools, train teams, and provide ongoing optimization. We also deliver AI talks and workshops.

Service Area
Tulsa, OK, OKC, and the greater Oklahoma area.

Core Services
- AI Strategy Assessment
- AI Integration
- Custom AI Development
- AI Training & Enablement
- Ongoing AI Support
- Talks & Presentations

Positioning
Business-first AI transformation, not a Silicon Valley dev shop. Focus on results, ROI, and adoption for real-world teams.

Pricing (public guidance)
- Starter: $1,750 (1-day assessment + recommendations)
- Growth: $7,500 (implementation + training)
- Enterprise: $20,000+ (custom development)
- Retainer: $1,500/month
- Talks: Tulsa-area keynotes start at $1,500 (workshops quoted)

Intro Call
Free 30-minute intro call.

Contact
Email: hello@rossapplied.ai
Book a call: https://rossapplied.ai/book-call/
